subject: Soccer
Copa America (Soccer)
Drunken and Reckless Driving
Officiating (Sports)
lead_paragraph: South America seems to put its star players on a pedestal, but some Europe-based stars at the Copa America have failed to live up to the adulation.
snippet: South America seems to put its star players on a pedestal, but some Europe-based stars at the Copa America have failed to live up to the adulation.
